DOC.brief_summary: Compare performance full cover metal stent plastic stent preoperative biliary decompression
DOC.brief_title: Trial Comparing Metal Versus Plastic Stents Preoperative Biliary Decompression
DOC.detailed_description: Covered self expandable metal stent ( CSEMS ) three time large diameter 10 Fr plastic stent . When compare plastic stent , randomize trial show longer patency few stent-related complication CSEMS . The investigator hypothesize placement CSEMS would better treatment option preoperative biliary decompression patient pancreatic cancer .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : 1 . Patients pancreatic cancer mass head pancreas cause jaundice . 2 . Patients 19 yrs age old 3 . Serum bilirubin > 2mg/dl 4 . CT : No evidence distant metastasis local vascular invasion ( tumor surround portal mesenteric vessel 180 degree circumference irregular vessel margin ) . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : 1 . Karnofsky score < 60 2 . Prior ( ERCP PTC ) attempt biliary decompression indication 3 . Tumorrelated gastric outlet obstruction ( vomit oral intake < 1L/day ) 4 . Ongoing plan neoadjuvant therapy 5 . Cholangitis presentation coagulopathy need reversal medication 6 . Postsurgical anatomy 7 . Multiple extrahepatic biliary stricture concomitant stricture liver hilum 8 . Failed ERCP 's ( Definition : Inability deploy biliary stent thereby require PTC surgery ) .
